802-1x.help: 802.1x security policy to be applied when using this port-policy.
802-1x.name: 802-1x

bounce-port-link.help: Enable/disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where this port policy is applied. Helps to clear and reassign VLAN from lldp-profile.
bounce-port-link.name: bounce-port-link

options.help: Disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where this port policy is applied.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where this port policy is applied.
options.name: enable

fortilink.help: FortiLink interface for which this port policy belongs to.
fortilink.name: fortilink

lldp-profile.help: LLDP profile to be applied when using this port-policy.
lldp-profile.name: lldp-profile

qos-policy.help: QoS policy to be applied when using this port-policy.
qos-policy.name: qos-policy

vlan-policy.help: VLAN policy to be applied when using this port-policy.
vlan-policy.name: vlan-policy

results.help: Configure port policy to be applied on the managed FortiSwitch ports through NAC device.
results.name: port-policy
